ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
//java.log(src)
aid=src.match(/read_aid = .(\d+)./)||[]
java.put("aid",aid[1])
	lis=java.getElement(
		"ul.chapterlisturl li");
		//java.log(baseUrl+result)
nth=src.match(
	/li:nth(-last)?-child.\d+./g);
	//java.log(nth.join())
		no=nth.map(n=>String(lis.select(n)));
		//java.log(no.join())
		list=lis.toArray().
		filter(x=>{
			a=no.indexOf(String(x))<0;
			return a
			}).join("\n");
			//java.log(list)
		//list=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(list)
		//.select("li");
	if(/\/1.?$/.test(baseUrl)){
	li=java.get("li")
	result=li+list;
	}else result=list;
	//java.log(baseUrl+result)
result
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if(result.match(/請勿瀏覽及購買本館商品，本網站已依照台灣網站內容分級規定處理。/)){
url="https://www.popo.tw{{@@id.books-form@action}}";

value=result.match(/name="_poporf-tk001" value="([^"]+)">/)[1];

Cookie=String(cookie.getCookie(baseUrl));
body='cid=&type=&_poporf-tk001='+value;

cookies=java.post(url,body,{"cookie":Cookie}).cookies();

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

header={"Cookie":String(Cookies)}
headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}
java.put('header',JSON.stringify(headers));
Url=baseUrl+','+JSON.stringify(headers);

result=String(java.ajax(Url))

}else{result=result}
</js>

<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
//工具函数
options ={
  "headers": {
    "Referer": baseUrl
  }
}
function add(url, options) {
  return !options ? url : `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}`;
}
String.prototype.add=function (){return add(this, arguments[0])};
//获取验证码
img =`https://gaofuwu.com/mytool/getVerify/?d=${Math.random()}`
code=java.getVerificationCode((img+"").add(options))
//拼接链接
b="https://gaofuwu.com/mytool/getChapterList/"
aid=baseUrl.match(/(\d+)\/$/)[1]
options=Object.assign(options,{
  "body": `verify=${code}&aid=${aid}&sbt=提交`,
  "method": "POST"
})
b.add(options)
</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>

//工具函数
options ={
  "headers": {
    "Referer": baseUrl
  }
}
function add(url, options) {
  return !options ? url : `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}`;
}
String.prototype.add=function (){return add(this, arguments[0])};


//获取验证码
img =`https://gaofuwu.com/mytool/getVerify/?d=${Math.random()}`
code=java.getVerificationCode((img+"").add(options))

//拼接链接
b="https://gaofuwu.com/mytool/getChapterList/"
aid=baseUrl.match(/(\d+)\/$/)[1]
options=Object.assign(options,{
  "body": `verify=${code}&aid=${aid}&sbt=提交`,
  "method": "POST"
})
b.add(options)

</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: class.authi.0@text##发表于.*
ruleBookInfo.name: //meta[@name="keywords"]/@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
String(result)
.replace(/\s*发表于\s*/g,"⌚️")
.replace(/回复:『\s*/g,'回复:『')
</js>
##以下内容需要积分高于 \d+ 才可浏览

ruleExplore.author: tag.cite.0@a@text||tag.cite.0@text
ruleExplore.name: class.s xst@text||tag.a.-1@text

ruleSearch.author: tag.span.1@text##匿名##匿名青花鱼
ruleSearch.name: tag.h3@a@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var n;
if
((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){
n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){
if(/page/.test(baseUrl)){
	list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i)});
	}else{
		list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.split(",")[0]+'&page='+i+',{"webView":true}'});
		}
}
}else if(!/返回列表/.test(src)){
list =''
}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
}
java.log(JSON.stringify(list))
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>
##<.*?mages/fullcolor.png.*?>
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##此章节需要购买[\s\S]+?💰[\s\S]+?此章节需要购买[\s\S]+?💰##请刷新正文看彩蛋

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
 Packages.java.lang,
 Packages.javax.crypto,
 Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
 Packages.java.io,
 Packages.java.util,
 Packages.java.util.zip,
);

with(javaImport){
 function decrypt(str){
 	var h=result.substring(16);
 	var u=result.substring(0,16);
 	var p=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(String(h));
 	var t=String("Shuew237HSFH242s").getBytes("UTF-8");
 var key=SecretKeySpec(t,"AES");
 var iv=IvParameterSpec(String(u).getBytes("UTF-8")); 
 var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
 chipher.init(2,key,iv);
 var m=chipher.doFinal(p);
 var arr1 = new Array(m.length+1);
 arr1.push(m);
 arr1[m.length]=0;
 var inflaterInputStream = new InflaterInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(m));
 var byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream(512);
 while (true) {
 var read = inflaterInputStream.read();
 if (read != -1) {
 byteArrayOutputStream.write(read);
 } else {
 	byteArrayOutputStream.close();
 return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
 }
 }
 }
}
decrypt(result)
</js>$.data

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://hongxiuzhao.me":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];


 
  u=tag=="cat2"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/2/0':u;
 u=tag=="cat0"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/0/0':u;
 u=tag=="cat1"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/1/0':u;
 u=tag=="tag"?'https://hongxiua.com/tags/'+url+'/{{page}}':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>
##<.*?mages/fullcolor.png.*?>

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://hongxiuzhao.me":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];


 
  u=tag=="cat2"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/2/0':u;
 u=tag=="cat0"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/0/0':u;
 u=tag=="cat1"?'https://hongxiua.com/category/'+url+'/{{page}}/1/0':u;
 u=tag=="tag"?'https://hongxiua.com/tags/'+url+'/{{page}}':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
content={ childNode:[], childNodes: result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)?java.getElements("#"+result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)[1]+"@p").toArray():"", UpWz:function(m, i) { var k = Math.ceil((i + 1) % this.code); k = Math.ceil(m - k); return k }, load:function(){ this.code=String(result).match(/codeurl="(\d+)"/)[1]; var e =String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name=client]@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); for (var i = 0; i < e.length; i++) { var k = this.UpWz(e[i], i); this.childNode[k]=this.childNodes[i] }} } if(baseUrl.match(/verify/)){ result="如果没获取到目录，说明验证码不对，详情页刷新重新获取验证码" }else{if(baseUrl.match(/\d+_2\.html/)){ content.load(); result=content.childNode.join("
");}else if(baseUrl.match(/\/\d+\.html/)){ result=java.getElements("#articlecontent@p") }else{ eval(String(java.ajax("http://www.ztgauntong.com/17mb/js/cryptojs_min.js"))); function d(a, b) { b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString(); var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16)); var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16)); return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8) } result=eval(result.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\)/)[1]); }}

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if(result.match(/請勿瀏覽及購買本館商品，本網站已依照台灣網站內容分級規定處理。/)){
url="https://www.popo.tw{{@@id.books-form@action}}";

value=result.match(/name="_poporf-tk001" value="([^"]+)">/)[1];

Cookie=String(cookie.getCookie(baseUrl));
body='cid=&type=&_poporf-tk001='+value;

cookies=java.post(url,body,{"cookie":Cookie}).cookies();

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

header={"Cookie":String(Cookies)}
headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}
java.put('header',JSON.stringify(headers));
Url=baseUrl+','+JSON.stringify(headers);

result=String(java.ajax(Url))

}else{result=result}
</js>
